sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Mastercom task with chargeback ID information.

sys_element_mapping.value:
dispute_chargeback_id={{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_id}}^work_notes=A chargeback has been filed.
Chargeback ID number ({{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_id}}) has been posted to the parent Mastercard claim number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_amount}}. ^state=3

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update parent dispute task with reference to chargeback ID.

sys_element_mapping.value: work_notes=A chargeback has been filed. Chargeback ID number ({{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_id}}) has been posted to the parent Mastercard claim number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_amount}}. Please see associated Mastercom task for additional information [code]{{bd5ff473-6f69-4dbf-aa23-0debed2c5316.record.number}}[/code]

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update the Mastercom task record with relevant details of API call.

sys_element_mapping.value: u_string_1={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}^disputed_amount={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}}^disputed_currency={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.disputed_currency}}^claim_type={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_type}}^authorization_transaction_id={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.auth_transaction_id}}^clearing_transaction_id={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.clearing_transaction_id}}^work_notes=Claim ID number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}} has been filed with the Mastercard Disputes network. ^u_currency_1={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}}^u_string_2={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.disputed_currency}}^u_choice_1=chargeback^reason_code=4853^chargeback_message_text=Dispute for {{Updated_1.current.customer.name}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create a Mastercom task record to capture the relevant details of the Mastercom API integration.
Update the parent card dispute task work notes

sys_element_mapping.value: work_notes=Claim ID number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}} has been filed with the Mastercard Disputes network.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Mastercom task with chargeback ID information.

sys_element_mapping.value:
dispute_chargeback_id={{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_id}}^work_notes=A chargeback has been filed.
Chargeback ID number ({{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_id}}) has been posted to the parent Mastercard claim number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_amount}}. ^state=3

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create a Mastercom task record to capture the relevant details of the Mastercom API integration.
Update the Mastercom task record with relevant details of API call.

sys_element_mapping.value: u_string_1={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}^disputed_amount={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}}^disputed_currency={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.disputed_currency}}^claim_type={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_type}}^authorization_transaction_id={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.auth_transaction_id}}^clearing_transaction_id={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.clearing_transaction_id}}^work_notes=Claim ID number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}} has been filed with the Mastercard Disputes network. ^u_currency_1={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}}^u_string_2={{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.disputed_currency}}^u_choice_1=chargeback^reason_code=4853^chargeback_message_text=Dispute for {{Updated_1.current.customer.name}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update the parent card dispute task work notes

sys_element_mapping.value: work_notes=Claim ID number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.transaction_amount_in_usd}} has been filed with the Mastercard Disputes network.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update parent dispute task with reference to chargeback ID.

sys_element_mapping.value: work_notes=A chargeback has been filed. Chargeback ID number ({{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_id}}) has been posted to the parent Mastercard claim number ({{01ec25e7-6c61-4353-8884-77f2e729bfa4.claim_id}}) in the amount of ${{5b3475ac-2093-485e-9bae-1d19a290d395.chargeback_amount}}. Please see associated Mastercom task for additional information [code]{{bd5ff473-6f69-4dbf-aa23-0debed2c5316.record.number}}[/code]
